awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: A cynical catholic priest is sent to Mexico to preach. It's the 30's and Mexican government sees the church as competition. They send a secret agent to assassinate the priest.
plot: A cynical catholic priest is sent to Mexico to preach. It's the 30's and Mexican government sees the church as competition. They send a secret agent to assassinate the priest.
title: The Power and the Glory
